ROW (basic) [FML].description: A simple flex based Row snippet with a common alignment

ROW (centered) [FML].description: A sized Row snippet with its children centered on both axis

ROW (w/ alignments) [FML].description: A horizontally expanding Row snippet with separately aligned children on each axis

body:
<ROW color="random,random" radius="8" border="all" bordercolor="random" borderwidth="2" elevation="4" shadowcolor="random" shadowx="0" shadowy="0">
    ${0}
</ROW>
ROW (decorated) [FML].description: A vertically expanding Row snippet with decoration attributes
